channel.title: Posts on Artificial Intelligence and Mathematics
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Artificial Intelligence and Mathematics

item.title: Computer Assisted Proofs
item.author: siddhartha.gadgil@gmail.com (Siddhartha Gadgil)
item.description: A rapidly growing area is Computer Assisted Proofs of claims that are expressed in precise mathematical terms. These can include ordinary mathematical theorems,as well as claims that pieces of hardware or software, network protocols, and mechanical and hybrid systems meet their specifications.

item.title: Levels of Thought
item.author: siddhartha.gadgil@gmail.com (Siddhartha Gadgil)
item.description: Computers excel at routine tasks and are capable of performing these with great precision and speed. Indeed one can even argue that the more routine a task is, the more the comparative advantage of a computer in performing this task, and so people have a comparative advantage in more sophisticated tasks.
